Service Details: - Offers 6-8 session group for children aged 5-12 years (children will be grouped into age appropriate sessions) who have experienced their parents' separation or divorce- Topics include: feelings, loss and change, loyalty and “being in the middle”, hopes and wishes and self-esteem- Children experience separation  differently than adults and may react with anger, profound sadness, anxiety, guilt or confusion; they may experience sleep problems, regression, school difficulties, aggression, or align with one parent over the other- During this fun, interactive process, kids will use art, games, discussion, and other activities to explore the changes in their lives
Address & Map: 347 Leon Ave, #204Kelowna, BC     V1Y 8C7View MapQuest Map
